pageSetting.title: 引用方案明细

table.title: 行员引用方案明细结果集

select.isEqual: select * from ( select fapz.khnf,fapz.famc,case when fapz.yyzlbh=1 then '产品营销计价' else '计分卡' end as fazl,'机构' khdx, case when fapz.khzq = 1 then '月' else case when fapz.khzq = 2 then '季' else '年' end end khzq, fapz.khqs from khfa_fapz fapz inner join khfa_khzbpz zbpz on fapz.fabh=zbpz.fabh where fapz.khdx='1' and zbpz.khzbdh =$khzbdh$ union all select znfapz.khnf,znfapz.famc,'职能部室' as fazl,'机构' khdx, case when znfapz.khzq = 1 then '月' else case when znfapz.khzq = 2 then '季' else '年' end end khzq, znfapz.khqs from znbs_fapz znfapz inner join znbs_khxmpz xmpz on znfapz.fabh=xmpz.fabh where znfapz.khdx='1' and xmpz.xmbh=$khzbdh$ ) t order by t.khnf,t.fazl,t.famc

select * from (select fapz.khnf,fapz.famc,case when fapz.yyzlbh=1 then '产品营销计价' else '计分卡' end as fazl,'机构' khdx, case when fapz.khzq = 1 then '月' else case when fapz.khzq = 2 then '季' else '年' end end khzq, fapz.khqs from khfa_fapz fapz inner join khfa_khzbpz zbpz on fapz.fabh=zbpz.fabh where fapz.khdx='2' and zbpz.khzbdh =$khzbdh$ union all select znfapz.khnf,znfapz.famc,'职能部室' as fazl,'行员' khdx, case when znfapz.khzq = 1 then '月' else case when znfapz.khzq = 2 then '季' else '年' end end khzq, znfapz.khqs from znbs_fapz znfapz inner join znbs_khxmpz xmpz on znfapz.fabh=xmpz.fabh where znfapz.khdx='2' and xmpz.xmbh=$khzbdh$ ) t order by t.khnf,t.fazl,t.famc

sqlMap.select:
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select * from ( select fapz.khnf,fapz.famc,case when fapz.yyzlbh=1 then '产品营销计价' else '计分卡' end as fazl,'机构' khdx, case when fapz.khzq = 1 then '月' else case when fapz.khzq = 2 then '季' else '年' end end khzq, fapz.khqs from khfa_fapz fapz inner join khfa_khzbpz zbpz on fapz.fabh=zbpz.fabh where fapz.khdx='1' and zbpz.khzbdh =$khzbdh$ union all select znfapz.khnf,znfapz.famc,'职能部室' as fazl,'机构' khdx, case when znfapz.khzq = 1 then '月' else case when znfapz.khzq = 2 then '季' else '年' end end khzq, znfapz.khqs from znbs_fapz znfapz inner join znbs_khxmpz xmpz on znfapz.fabh=xmpz.fabh where znfapz.khdx='1' and xmpz.xmbh=$khzbdh$ ) t order by t.khnf,t.fazl,t.famc
select * from (select fapz.khnf,fapz.famc,case when fapz.yyzlbh=1 then '产品营销计价' else '计分卡' end as fazl,'机构' khdx, case when fapz.khzq = 1 then '月' else case when fapz.khzq = 2 then '季' else '年' end end khzq, fapz.khqs from khfa_fapz fapz inner join khfa_khzbpz zbpz on fapz.fabh=zbpz.fabh where fapz.khdx='2' and zbpz.khzbdh =$khzbdh$ union all select znfapz.khnf,znfapz.famc,'职能部室' as fazl,'行员' khdx, case when znfapz.khzq = 1 then '月' else case when znfapz.khzq = 2 then '季' else '年' end end khzq, znfapz.khqs from znbs_fapz znfapz inner join znbs_khxmpz xmpz on znfapz.fabh=xmpz.fabh where znfapz.khdx='2' and xmpz.xmbh=$khzbdh$ ) t order by t.khnf,t.fazl,t.famc ) t
